title: Export Accounts to Mobile Thunderbird
content:
Hi, I'm using macOS 15.0.1 and Thunderbird 128.4.2esr (64-bit). I want to export my settings to the mobile version of Thunderbird using the QR code. However, when I select "Export for Mobile," I don't see any accounts available for export, and both buttons are grayed out. I have five IMAP accounts set up.

-- jacek
creator: jacek29

title: Finding Address books after upgrade of internal storage to 2 TB in Thunderbird
content:
The situation is the following. I had the Geek Squad from Best Buy upgrade my Hp Envy laptop internal storage from 512 GB to 2 TBs Oct 29-31, 2024. I use Thunderbird and have done so for at least 19 yrs. I was told that I would need to download all the application programs again after the upgrade , but that all my data would be stored on the download they did from my internal storage to the new storage. I successfully reinstalled the Thunderbird Program. However I am missing all my contacts in my address books except for 24 names and addresses. I truthfully don't know how many I had in each address book but as I said I have been using this program for 19yrs. So it was in the hundreds. The Geek Squad member tried to fix this but was unable to locate the correct file that the address contacts might be located, I think he tried a mab file. They said that since it was a third party app that I should try Thunderbird Support. Have I lost all my addresses or is there a way to search for them using my new internal storage?. Since this is an HP laptop with a Microsoft 11, it has OneDrive so I am sure that there is a complication in finding the file once I know the type of file I need to be looking for. Thanks for any advice you can give on this matter.

Madeleine Mitchell,
creator: Rngmaddy

title: Mac osx Thunderbird ImportExportTools NG menu doubled
content:
Hello,

I used ImportExportTools for many years, but recently (it started a couple of years ago) Thunderbird on Apple Mac has a very annoying issue: the corresponding ImportExportTools in top bar Tools menu is doubled and lack of functionalities.

If I right-click and choose ImportExportTools from the drop-down menu it works flawlessy.

I contacted the ImportExportTools developer, and togheter we tried to sort out the issue discovering it's not related to ImportExportTools iteself but to the Thunderbird instead.

I tried as well to report this to Thunderbird developer, but without any luck.

Does anyone has experienced this issue? Hopefully some of the Thunderbird developers are looking at the forum and they become aware of the issue.

Thanks.
creator: k_s

title: "Reply To" Behaves strange/wrong
content: As secretary of a bridge club I use "replay to" very frequently. To my surprise it behaves funny with version 128.4.2. When send to recipients and replaying to the recieved email I see the screen where another account signature is used and the replay is not filled in. As this is send to about 100 people its not nice. Hope you can fix this.
creator: cees8

title: sincronizzazione non riuscita con l'account principale
content: Salve, thunderbird non sincronizza le cartelle e sottocartelle con l'account principale, questo però e solo con un account di posta elettronica, come potete vedere dall'allegato. In thunderbird, nelle impostazioni account, sincronizzazione e archiviazione, avanzate, elementi per uso non in linea, da scaricare, sono flaggate. Come posso fare per risolvere il problema che non vedo le cartelle e sottocartelle dell'account principale? Grazie
creator: ego.agcom

title: Mail che finiscono nelle spam del destinatario
content: Gentile Assistenza, sono un libero professionista. Per la spedizione massiva delle mail ai miei clienti utilizzo il mio software professionale che a sua volta si appoggia al mio software di posta elettronica, Thunderbird. Accade spesso che miei clienti mi dicano che le mie mail finiscano nelle spam. Le mail che io invio invece le vedo fra la posta inviata. Dove sta il problema? Grazie per l'aiuto!
creator: demartintopraninsilvia

title: Thunderbird non riesce più a leggere il profilo esistente
content: Buongiorno. A seguito dell'aggiornamento di Ubuntu Mate alla 24.04LTS, Thunderbird ha cessato di funzionare correttamente. Per questo motivo ho reinstallato la 22.04LTS. Tuttavia, dopo la nuova installazione di Thunderbird, quando provo a creare un nuovo profilo collegandolo al profilo esistente salvato in una cartella di una partizione destinata ai dati, mi compare un messaggio (vedi allegato) che mi dice che il profilo è stato creato con una versione più recente e non può essere aperto. Cosa impossibile dato che ho installato, ovviamente, la versione più recente di Thunderbird. Come posso fare a far leggere il profilo a Thunderbird?
creator: beppe1259

title: How to import email sub-folder contents from another email provider into Thunderbird?
content: Seeking knowledge if possible, on how to import email sub-folder contents from another email provider (in this case, 'The Messaging Company') into Thunderbird. The "Import Tool" in Thunderbird appears limited to only a few sources that it can import from, however I'm unsure if there is another way. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance.
creator: k.dynamics

title: SMTP Error
content:
The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.bbgalle.com failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again.

-error-
creator: prageethmiyuranga20

title: Adressbook from Carddav Server not working any more
content:
Recently upgraded from older version to TB 128.3.3.esr

Until then CardDav Server connect (remote adressbook) does not work any more. At least to https://sync.infomaniak.com/. Getting always Connection Failure (interface and logging console). See image. Whatever username is used.

CalDav Connection (to same server) works perfectly. Events get bidirectionally synced.

Anybody an idea, why caldav works, and carddav not.

Thanks for hints an helps. Reto Diener, Switzerland
creator: reto.diener

title: IMAP Synchronization
content:
I am using Thunderbird to archive emails to a local folder. I have put emails in separate folders by year. Still, it took a much longer time than I expected. I guess the reason might be synchronization. Often Thunderbird download the same folder, or a set of messages in a folder, repeatedly. It is hard to tell how many messages have a local copy.

One example is showing in the attached picture. It has been stuck there for a long time. Apparently, the progress bars are not drawn correctly. The lower folder is almost done by the number of messages, not the top one.

Thunderbird version: 128.4.1esr. OS: Windows 11.

title: Transferring Tbird to a ne PC:missing .js file in .default
content:
I created an export .zip from Tbird on my current Win10 PC, intending to import it into a new Tbird installation on my new Win 11 PC. This is the second such migration: I did my own mailboxes no bother last night but this time its my wife's. My pack was less than 2GB, hers is just over.

I unzipped at the target PC, and attmpted the import. It failed with this error: Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: Could not open `C:\Users\marie\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\39la2kp7.default\prefs.js': file does not exist (NS_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND)

Is there any alternative to demanding even deeper pruning of her archived messages?

It took a day or two to repair the sent email inbox and I couldn't hardly use my email at all while that was occurring because every time I would click on something, it would take 30-40 seconds to open it.

It thankfully doesn't freeze as long this time and is still usable, any help on correcting this?

title: Thunderbird 115 - multiple computers - WAV file fails with one account -  See details
content:
Thunderbird issue:

System: Two computers running Linux Mint 21.3 - Google Chrome is the default browser.

Both running Thunderbird 115

Both have the same two accounts set up  : Pop3 – gmail.com

Both accounts were announcing ‘You Have Mail” using custom WAV file.

Both accounts are set for manual downloads.

I stay up to date on all updates for system as well as TB

Issue:

All worked A-O.K. until a month ago when one (primary account on one computer stopped announcing “You Have Mail”. The other account (secondary) as well as both accounts on the other computer still function normally, i.e. the wav file is functional.

I have tried everything that I can think of to address the issue but have been coming up empty handed.

I haven’t messed with the css files but have change paths to the file, used a different wav file. Tried oga, mp3, etc. all with no fix. I’ve changed themes and checked other add-ons. Still no fix.

I could live without it but I’m one that likes to have everything working!

Is it in my profile or what?

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Ron Haltermon, Dothan, AL USA
creator: rhaltermon
